```{r}

library(readr)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r}
#| label: lectura
df_epf <- read_csv2(
    "~/Downloads/25168.csv", 
    locale = locale(encoding = "latin1", grouping_mark = ".", decimal_mark = ",")
) 
df_epf <- janitor::clean_names(df_epf)
df_epf <- df_epf |> 
  mutate(total = parse_number(total, locale = locale(grouping_mark = ".", decimal_mark = ","), na = c("..")))
```

df_epf |> 
  filter()
